channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Failing branches and leaf drop making pavement very slippery, 19th October
item.description:
Branches from the tree outside number 29 and 31 are failing on the road and driveways. Excessive leaf drop is making the pavement slippery, trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Gardens, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of large kitchen appliance, 19th October
item.description:
This was dumped in the early hours of Sunday morning, by the tenant at 10 springwater close. A white trail from the scrapping of the fridge freezer leads to the tenants property as shown in the photos attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springwater Close, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Electrical wires exposed, 19th October
item.description:
Bus stop P at Marble Arch (Oxford Street) has its flap open with "danger 230 volts" items visible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 527, Oxford Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - wires exposed on bus shelter

item.title: Uneven paving stone in Kechill Gardens, 19th October
item.description:
There is an uneven paving stone in Kechill Gardens near street lighting column K336 (going towards the bend in the road). Please would you inspect and undertake the necessary remedial work so the stone does not represent a trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kechill Gardens, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small heavy bag Wickham Way, 19th October
item.description:
Small heavy bag, possibly with building materials, in Wickham Way by St Dunstans Lane and opposite Barnfield Wood Road. Please remove bag. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawksbrook Lane, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven paving stones outside 224 to 226 Hayes Lane, 19th October
item.description:
There are several uneven paving stones near the street tree outside 224 to 226 Hayes Lane. Please would you inspect and then take remedial work to make sure that all the stones lie flat and do not present a trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on carriageway in Club Gardens Road, 19th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Club Gardens Road, Hayes, London

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, London

item.title: Someone has dumped all sorts on corner of St Kildas and Heathland Road N16, 19th October
item.description:

item.title: Driver and passenger of vehicle leave food litter on street, 19th October
item.description:
